hello.intro: Capital Challenge Horse Show runs September 24–October 5, 2025, bringing A-circuit hunters, equitation, and jumpers to Prince George Equestrian Center in Upper Marlboro, Maryland. Early fall here feels crisp and green suburban, with calm mornings and soft light—good headspace for course-walks. The venue is a multi-ring complex with ample stabling and easy suburban access. Keep eyes on the warm-up ring and jog strip, then reset off-ring without losing rhythm. Arrive organized. We set the week so you stay ring-focused and fresh when it counts at Capital Challenge Horse Show.
hello.outro: Keep the week simple and sport-forward. I can book lodging, map one barn dinner, and prep essentials so you walk into Capital Challenge Horse Show ready to ride.

stay.title: Where to Stay
stay.paragraph: Anchor at premium bases like the Gaylord National Resort and The Hotel at The University of Maryland for polished rooms and predictable service, then keep a close-in option such as Courtyard by Marriott Largo for fast morning drives. This trio balances comfort, parking ease, and quick returns between rounds.
stay.cta: Want it handled? I’ll lock rooms and sync confirmations.

items.name: The Hotel at The University of Maryland
Courtyard by Marriott Largo Medical Center Drive

dine.title: Dine
dine.am: Start AM near the venue at First Watch for reliable coffee and protein-forward plates before the jog strip. If the morning stretches, Milk & Honey Cafe runs a hearty southern-leaning brunch that still moves fast between schooling and orders of go.
dine.dinner: After classes, book Copper Canyon Grill for steaks and rotisserie that work for mixed crews, or set Grace’s Steak & Seafood when you want a slightly dressier table. For a lighter, eclectic option with easy conversation, Busboys and Poets Hyattsville keeps timing flexible after late rings.
dine.cta: I’ll map a barn-friendly dinner loop with quick reservations.

locale.title: Locale — Off-Barn
locale.paragraph: Upper Marlboro sits in a calm suburban belt near D.C., so resets are straightforward: short drives for coffee, bigger retail clusters for lunch, and riverfront areas within a broader radius if the schedule allows. Plan quick loops so vendor row and stabling stay your center of gravity.

essentials.title: Essentials
essentials.paragraph: Keep basics within a simple loop: Giant Food Upper Marlboro for groceries and ice, CVS Pharmacy in the same plaza for OTC and fills, Southern States Upper Marlboro Co‑op for feed, bedding, and tack, Enterprise Largo for SUV rentals, and Dever, Inc. for golf cart deliveries coordinated with the show office.
essentials.cta: I’ll pack a lean kit so nothing slows your rounds.

items.name: CVS Pharmacy Upper Marlboro
items.alt: Pharmacy with drive‑thru; same plaza as Giant

items.name: Enterprise Rent‑A‑Car Largo
items.alt: Closest rental branch; SUVs and vans
